author: Herald Staff
title: Herald Heroes
text:
OFFENSE — Alex Hulme, WR, Salve Regina. Senior from Hopkinton set a school single-game record with 269 receiving yards on 11 catches and had three touchdowns in a 40-21 win against Endicott.
DEFENSE — Jarrod Casey, S, Assumption. Sophomore from Milford posted a game-high 17 tackles in a wild 60-50 win against Southern Connecticut.
SPECIAL TEAMS — Jackson McGonagle, P, Amherst. Senior punted six times for 243 yards (40.5 average), including a long of 78 yards that broke a 73-year-old school mark, as the Lord Jeffs beat Colby, 31-13.
